Content:: The 12th Biathlon World Championships were held in 1973 in Lake Placid, United States. It is the first time the championships took place outside Europe.[1] Alexander Tikhonov Rinnat Safin Yuriy Kolmakov Gennady Kovalyev Tor Svendsberget Esten Gjelten Ragnar Tveiten Kjell Hovda Dieter Speer Manfred Geyer Herbert Wiegand GÃ¼nther Bartnick
